Oct. 6, 1900 D Victorian State Championships (A Grade)
Victorian State Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Victorian State Championships victorian-state-championships
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Ballarat Oval , Ballarat, Victoria, Australia Billed as the Grand Inter-colonial Band Contest as part of the Royal South Street Eisteddfod (Ballarat) Conditions -Reed Instruments permitted ( 3rd Battalion Launceston only band to include reed) No Drums or Cymbals No less than 16 or more than 24 players
Bands required to play 2 own choice selections Selection No.1 points listed under Test Selection No.2 points listed under Own Choice.
March 9, 2020, 12:39 a.m. March 9, 2020, 2:48 a.m.
